1.title: Pixels

episode of.title: The Lord of the Flick Movie Review Show (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: The first ever episode of the LOTF show. Today's review is the Adam Sandler video game comedy Pixels. Is it truly as bad as everyone says? Or could it be an under appreciated gem?

2.title: The Good Dinosaur

episode of.title: The Lord of the Flick Movie Review Show (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Today's review is of Pixar's first flop, The Good Dinosaur. But is it actually any good?

3.title: Chappie

episode of.title: The Lord of the Flick Movie Review Show (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: A film about artificial intelligence gone wrong? How original. The Lord Of The Flick takes a look at the Neill Blomkamp flop "Chappie".

4.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice

imdb.plot outline: The Lord of the Flick is tasked with reviewing some of the worst films of all time. He is joined by some of his puppet friends and actual friends as they try to take down General Grizzly: an evil humanoid bear who is trying to get revenge on him for giving bears a bad name in a review he did, The B.A.D (Bad Actors Division): A group of bad actors who want him off the internet, and a mysterious figure known as The Hippocrite: An internet troll who vows to ruin his career. Now it's up to The Lord of the Flick and his friends to review these films and fight whatever evil comes there way.
imdb.title: The Lord of the Flick Movie Review Show
akas: The Lord of the Flick Movie Review Show (Canada)
plot: A film reviewer and his puppet friends review some of the worst films of all time, while also saving the world from several evil doers.::Caelan Cavanagh

The Lord of the Flick is tasked with reviewing some of the worst films of all time. He is joined by some of his puppet friends and actual friends as they try to take down General Grizzly: an evil humanoid bear who is trying to get revenge on him for giving bears a bad name in a review he did, The B.A.D (Bad Actors Division): A group of bad actors who want him off the internet, and a mysterious figure known as The Hippocrite: An internet troll who vows to ruin his career. Now it's up to The Lord of the Flick and his friends to review these films and fight whatever evil comes there way.
